uk.ac.cam.caret.sakai.rwiki.tool.bean.helper

Class ReviewHelperBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.caret.sakai.rwiki.tool.bean.helper.ReviewHelperBean

  • public class ReviewHelperBean
extends Object
    Bean which will create a mock RWikiObject with the content set to the content of a requested revision
    Author:
    andrew
